plan_description: This plan is designed for those looking to lose weight. It includes a mix of cardio and strength training exercises to help you burn calories and build muscle.
This plan is designed for those looking to maintain their current weight. It includes a mix of cardio and strength training exercises to help you stay active and healthy.
This plan is designed for those looking to gain muscle mass. It includes a mix of strength training exercises to help you build muscle and increase strength.
This plan is designed for those looking to increase their overall strength. It includes a variety of strength training exercises to help you build muscle and increase strength.
This plan is designed for those looking to improve their cardiovascular endurance. It includes a variety of cardio exercises to help you increase your endurance and burn calories.
